technique.name: captured leaves
technique.attack: right hand finger lock to the left hand

steps.step: step toward 12:00 into a neutral bow as you thrust your left hand forward and above your head
pivot into a reverse bow as you execute a back elbow to your opponent's left kidney.
pivot into a forward bow as you execute a outward elbow to your opponent's left ribs. Simultaneously grab and control your opponent's right wrist with your right hand.
